message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.SI 

This paper discusses a learning scheme and proposes a new greedy metric to refine the learning process. The paper is focused on machine learning and optimization, which suggests that it is likely to belong to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper discusses the application of the proposed method in computer vision (cs.CV) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions the avoidance of overfitting/underfitting, which is a common problem in neural networks and optimization, indicating that it could belong to the sub-categories of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
